name: QbertStudyProject
description:
Controls

1 - 3 - 7 - 9 on numpad move qbert around.

Mechanics

Try to paint all the platforms the same color by jumping on them. 

Take care with the red ball and coily they take a life on contact. 

the green ball freezes all hazard for a wile and the two elevators at the edge of the board can save your life!

Credits

Lucas Krespi dos Santos 

Based on the original Qbert* game.
